summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Northeast 135th St. from 27th Ave. Northeast to 35th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19216 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
